document.full_text: former sac capital advisors lp analyst jonathan hollander reached a settlement with u.s. securities regulators over allegations he engaged in insider trading in his personal account, while working at steven a. cohen's $12 billion hedge fund.
document.title: former sac analyst settles insider charges with sec
lines_and_colors: former sac capital advisors lp analyst jonathan hollander reached a settlement with u.s. securities regulators over allegations he engaged in insider trading in his personal account, while working at steven a. cohen's $12 billion hedge fund.
